00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_THREADEDPIPELINE_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_THREADEDPIPELINE_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 
00031 #if NOISEPP_ENABLE_THREADS == 0
00032 #error To use this classes please set NOISEPP_ENABLE_THREADS to 1
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 namespace noisepp
00036 {
00045         template <class Element>
00046         class ThreadedPipeline : public Pipeline<Element>
00047         {
00048                 private:
00049                         threadpp::ThreadGroup mThreads;
00050                         threadpp::Mutex mMutex;
00051                         threadpp::Condition mCond, mMainCond;
00052 
00053                         bool mThreadsDone;
00054                         unsigned mWorkingThreads;
00055                         PipelineJobQueue mJobsDone;
00056                         void threadFunction ()
00057                         {
00058                                 Cache *cache = NULL;
00059                                 threadpp::Mutex::Lock lk(mMutex);
00060                                 while (!mThreadsDone)
00061                                 {
00062                                         if (Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.empty())
00063                                                 mCond.wait(lk);
00064                                         if (!Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.empty())
00065                                         {
00066                                                 PipelineJob *job = Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.front ();
00067                                                 Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.pop ();
00068                                                 ++mWorkingThreads;
00069                                                 lk.unlock ();
00070                                                 if (!cache)
00071                                                         cache = Pipeline<Element>::createCache();
00072                                                 job->execute(cache);
00073                                                 lk.lock ();
00074                                                 --mWorkingThreads;
00075                                                 mJobsDone.push (job);
00076                                                 mMainCond.notifyOne ();
00077                                         }
00078                                 }
00079                                 lk.unlock ();
00080                                 if (cache)
00081                                 {
00082                                         Pipeline<Element>::freeCache (cache);
00083                                 }
00084                         }
00085                         static void *threadEntry (void *pipe)
00086                         {
00087                                 (static_cast<ThreadedPipeline<Element>*>(pipe))->threadFunction ();
00088                                 return NULL;
00089                         }
00090 
00091                 public:
00094                         ThreadedPipeline (size_t numberOfThreads) : mThreadsDone(false), mWorkingThreads(0)
00095                         {
00096                                 NoiseAssert (numberOfThreads > 0, numberOfThreads);
00097                                 for (size_t i=0;i<numberOfThreads;++i)
00098                                 {
00099                                         mThreads.createThread (threadEntry, this);
00100                                 }
00101                         }
00104                         virtual void executeJobs ()
00105                         {
00106                                 mCond.notifyAll();
00107                                 threadpp::Mutex::Lock lk(mMutex);
00108                                 while (!Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.empty() || mWorkingThreads > 0)
00109                                 {
00110                                         if (!Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.empty() || mWorkingThreads > 0)
00111                                                 mMainCond.wait(lk);
00112                                         while (!mJobsDone.empty())
00113                                         {
00114                                                 PipelineJob *job = mJobsDone.front ();
00115                                                 mJobsDone.pop ();
00116                                                 lk.unlock ();
00117                                                 job->finish ();
00118                                                 delete job;
00119                                                 lk.lock ();
00120                                         }
00121                                 }
00122                         }
00124                         virtual void addJob (PipelineJob *job)
00125                         {
00126                                 NoiseAssert (job != NULL, job);
00127                                 threadpp::Mutex::Lock lk(mMutex);
00128                                 Pipeline<Element>::mJobs.push (job);
00129                         }
00131                         virtual ~ThreadedPipeline ()
00132                         {
00133                                 mThreadsDone = true;
00134                                 mCond.notifyAll();
00135                                 mThreads.join ();
00136                         }
00137         };
00138 
00147         typedef ThreadedPipeline<PipelineElement1D> ThreadedPipeline1D;
00156         typedef ThreadedPipeline<PipelineElement2D> ThreadedPipeline2D;
00165         typedef ThreadedPipeline<PipelineElement3D> ThreadedPipeline3D;
00166 };
00167 
00168 #endif // NOISEPP_THREADEDPIPELINE_H
